item.title: Get a Python development environment with Poetry
item.description: ## background Poetry reached 1.0.0 on December 12, 2019, so I tried it. Overview Poetry is a packaging and dependency management tool for Python. As a similar tool, There are setuptools and Pipenv, but Poetry one can cover both functions. I am attracted to the point that “one toml file is all I need”. Or rather, I thought it was wonderful. version poetry v1.0.5 (latest as of May 11, 2020)
